content:
att.timed

provides attributes common to those elements which have a duration in time, expressed either absolutely or by reference to an alignment map. [8.3.5 Temporal Information]
Moduletei â€” Declarations for classes, datatypes, and macros available to all TEI modules
MembersannotationBlock binaryObject ellipsis gap incident kinesic media pause u vocal writing
Attributes
  • att.duration ( ) (att.duration.w3c ( @dur ) ) (att.duration.iso ( @dur-iso ) )
    • @start
    indicates the location within a temporal alignment at which this element begins.
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.pointer
    @end
    indicates the location within a temporal alignment at which this element ends.
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.pointer
